events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your documents carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as per your indicated skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering positions has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, discussing your background and motivation for the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for promptly responding to the recruiterâ€™s questions and confirming your availability for the next steps in the hiring process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 7th. The session will focus on coding challenges and system design questions.
The technical interview was completed successfully. You demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and solid knowledge of software development principles.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your cultural fit, benefits, and company policies. Please confirm your availability.
Your HR interview has been completed. The discussion was positive, and your questions about the role and organization were well received.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including details of compensation, benefits, and next steps.
Thank you for providing your feedback and questions regarding the offer. We appreciate your openness and engagement in this process.
We are excited to confirm your acceptance of our offer and welcome you to our engineering team. Next, onboarding will begin shortly.
Your onboarding process has started. We have sent you the necessary resources and schedules to help you integrate smoothly into the team.
The hiring process has been successfully completed. We are thrilled to have you join us and look forward to your contributions as a Software Engineer.
